name: Careerland
description: If youre actively looking for new professional opportunities or just want to get relevant job suggestions until the perfect fit is made then the Careerland app is for you.  The Careerland app is for ambitious professionals with a couple of years of experience.   It has never been easier to find a job and even get headhunted on the go. These are few of the features:  * Start chats with companies that match your job preferences * Let recruiters from your favorite companies reach out to you * Receive job alerts for jobs relevant to you * Join LIVE Sessions with popular companies * Browse and apply for jobs all over the world * Get notified when recruiters look at your profile and applications  * Follow your favorite companies and get updates about new job opportunities that match your qualifications   Get headhunted The Careerland app is more than just a regular job finder app. Just by signing up you can make your profile available for recruiters all over the world. In that way, you can let the recruiters come to you and not the other way round.   We match you with a job Careerland is truly data-driven and makes the data work to your advantage. Just by adding a few job preferences well start matching your profile with jobs from all over the world. No matter if youre looking for business analyst job in the Danish tech industry, senior project manager in the finance sector in The Netherlands or whatever you desire - we got it!  Chat your way to the job You can get notified when your favorite companies are live and ready to chat. In that way, you can quickly be introduced to the recruiters without going through the time-consuming process of making an application to figure out if youre the right match.    Download the Careerland app now and accelerate your career.
